fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Fortify  - Learn how many of each type of faction visit the targetted player
Guard (2 uses) - Pick a target, and learn the name of a player that visits your target and their role. If nobody visits, learn the role of your target instead.
Aim (Day Ability) - Pick a target. For the rest of the game, learn who that target visits each night. You may not have more than 1 aimed target at all times.
